channel.title: When i try to post server on server status page
channel.description:
hi guys i really need help when ever i go to post my server on server status it says this and i dunno what it means look what it says please help :|
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'runepure1.no-ip.org' OR `ipfield` = '68.240.6.181'' at line 1
